bibl.title: Identifiable and Associated Cordage Examples from Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast).
bibl.note: Introduction. - The material: Grommets and ring-shaped objects; - Basketry and textiles; - (Bed) matting, harnesses, saddles and bags; - Pottery and jar stoppers; - Brushes; - Sticks and poles; - Various. - Discussion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en espagnol.

bibl.title: Antiguo Oriente. Cuadernos del Centro de Estudios de Historia del Antiguo Oriente

bibl.seg: André J. Veldmeijer, Identifiable and Associated Cordage Examples from Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast).
Antiguo Oriente. Cuadernos del Centro de Estudios de Historia del Antiguo Oriente 3 (2005) pp. 65-87, 1 tabl. et 31 figg.

Introduction. - The material: Grommets and ring-shaped objects; - Basketry and textiles; - (Bed) matting, harnesses, saddles and bags; - Pottery and jar stoppers; - Brushes; - Sticks and poles; - Various. - Discussion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en espagnol.
